name: Indian Python
description: A large non-venomous python species found in tropical and subtropical regions of the Indian subcontinent.

name: Common Krait
description: The common krait is a comprehensive species of highly venomous elapid snake found in the jungles of the Indian subcontinent.

name: Rat Snake
description: A common species of non-venomous colubrid snake found in parts of South and Southeast Asia. They are known to grow to large sizes.

name: Russell's Viper
description: A species of venomous snake in the family Viperidae, native to the Indian subcontinent and one of the big four snakes in India.

name: Checkered Keelback
description: A species of non-venomous snake found in Asia. It is a very aggressive snake but its bite is not fatal to humans.

name: Saw-scaled Viper
description: A venomous viper species found in parts of the Middle East and Central Asia, and especially the Indian subcontinent.

name: Green Vine Snake
description: A slender green tree snake found in India, Sri Lanka, Bangladesh, Burma, Thailand, Cambodia and Vietnam.
